# Bits and pieces I've been working on

## Odin js course
In 2014, I decided to improve my knowledge of javascript, through the [Odin js course](http://www.theodinproject.com/javascript-and-jquery). Some of the more interesting parts of the course:
- [tic-tac-toe](niallconnaughton.github.io/jscourse/tictactoe/index.html)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
